about_the_game:
Take the journey of a lifetime with Thor and the Vikings! Go to Ancient Greece and help Thor, Hercules’ daughter Alexia, and the other warriors save Midgard from Fenrir.

Fenrir, a giant wolf, is ready to destroy Midgard and all its inhabitants in his rage. Follow Fenrir’s story and explore the source of his immense anger as he sets off on a path of destruction. Discover a thrilling story and find out what made Fenrir so angry that he has resolved to destroy Midgard.

Are you ready to join the Vikings on their epic quest to defeat the Minotaur? You’ll have to prove your worth by solving the Gods’ puzzles. Embark on an unforgettable adventure as you join the Vikings in their mission to bring peace back to the world!

Get ready to embark on a journey to the mythical world of Olympus! Go on Zeus’ quest and find a special flower for the goddess Calypso. Along the way, you will explore the mysterious underworld, meet Hades, and uncover secrets about Cerberus.
detailed_description:
Take the journey of a lifetime with Thor and the Vikings! Go to Ancient Greece and help Thor, Hercules’ daughter Alexia, and the other warriors save Midgard from Fenrir.

Fenrir, a giant wolf, is ready to destroy Midgard and all its inhabitants in his rage. Follow Fenrir’s story and explore the source of his immense anger as he sets off on a path of destruction. Discover a thrilling story and find out what made Fenrir so angry that he has resolved to destroy Midgard.

Are you ready to join the Vikings on their epic quest to defeat the Minotaur? You’ll have to prove your worth by solving the Gods’ puzzles. Embark on an unforgettable adventure as you join the Vikings in their mission to bring peace back to the world!

Get ready to embark on a journey to the mythical world of Olympus! Go on Zeus’ quest and find a special flower for the goddess Calypso. Along the way, you will explore the mysterious underworld, meet Hades, and uncover secrets about Cerberus.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS X 10 or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 or any Intel CPU
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS X 13 or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 or any Intel CPU

name: Ancient Saga: Vikings Journey

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G5400 / AMD Ryzen 3 2200G
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / Nvidia GeForce 710 / AMD Radeon HD 6450
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3 or better
  • Graphics: Intel HD 6000 / Nvidia GeForce 720 / AMD Radeon HD 5570
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Thor and the Vikings are on a mission to save Midgard from Fenrir. To achieve their aim, they take a daring journey to Ancient Greece in search of a remedy. However, they soon realize that the task ahead of them will be harder than they imagined.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support
